name: Tartaros Cluster
description: Cluster ordnance splits into a number of seperate bomblets, resulting in a robust carpet bombing of ground targets. **{{$1}}**. **3 clusters**. Reload **6 seconds**.

name: Perun Kinetic Rods
description: This tank-sized nailgun rains down tungsten rods, impaling targets below with raw kinetic power. **{{$1}}**. **6 rods**. Reload **{{$2}}**.

name: Dolos Ultra PP Bomb
description: This persistent jumping bomb will eventually hit the target, even if the initial impact misses. Although the lightweight nature of the bomb limits the force of the explosion, its exceptionally large area of effect often catches multiple enemy units in the blast wave. **{{$1}}**. **4 bombs**. Reload **5 seconds**.

name: Hecate Grenade
description: Versatile and battle-proven, this standard military-issue high-explosive grenade is effective in any combat situation. **{{$1}}**. **4 grenades**. Reload **4 seconds**.

name: Perses Proximity Shredder
description: Primarily an anti-aircraft floating mine, it hangs in the air until a nearby target triggers it to explode into widespread shrapnel. **470 total damage per mine**. **{{$1}}**. Reload **6.7 seconds**.

name: Void Ray
description: An advanced accelerator produces a thin stream of superheated dark matter particles. These bore into targets below, delivering a precisely targeted void blast of dark plasma. Up to **{{$1}}**. **5 charges**. Reload **2.5 seconds**.

name: Horus Plasma Charge
description: The most powerful plasma bomb available. Each Horus charge creates a searing orb of green plasma, melting the toughest armor and incinerating soft targets. **{{$1}}**. **2 charges**. Reload **5 seconds**.
